page.title: 08Sunday with my family
page.content: At about half past eight my family get up. Daddy goes and makes a cup of tea. When we go downstairs our dog Lady goes wild. Daddy takes Lady for a walk. Mummy makes the breakfast while Emma and I watch Superbook on the TV. When Scoopy-doopy-dog is on we are called for breakfast. After breakfast daddy goes to football and mummy cooks the dinner. At 11.00 Emma and I go off to Sunday school at Leigh Methodist Church. At 12.00 we come home. We have a roast lunch and the dog always sits by my feet. After lunch we go into the garden. Mummy weeds while daddy grows his vegetables. Emma plays while I play with the dog. At 4.00 I go for tea. I play until 7.00 and then I go to bed. My sister goes to bed at 6.00. Written by Louise Metcalfe (9yrs)
